description: Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM) Policy and Procedures documentation
Supply Chain Risk Management Plan including risk tolerance, mitigation strategies, roles and responsibilities, and lifecycle security engineering processes
SCRM Team charter or documentation identifying team members, roles, responsibilities, and assigned SCRM activities
Supply chain custody documentation for all devices, including replacement devices, showing integrity verification before introduction to the system boundary
Documented supply chain controls and processes to identify and address weaknesses in supply chain elements
Acquisition strategies, contract tools, and procurement methods documentation addressing supply chain risk mitigation
Supplier and contractor risk assessment reports conducted at least annually, including security processes, FOCI analysis, and subordinate supplier assessments
Evidence that supply chain vendors build and test systems in alignment with NIST SP 800-171 or commensurate security framework
Vendor compliance documentation for physical facility access and logical access controls to supplied products
Notification agreements and procedures with supply chain entities for supply chain compromises and assessment/audit results
Documentation of vendor notification process for newly discovered vulnerabilities including zero-day vulnerabilities
Tamper protection program documentation including safeguards for authenticity of software and patches supplied by vendors
Evidence of anti-tamper technologies, tools, and techniques employed throughout the system development lifecycle
System and component inspection procedures and records to detect tampering
Anti-counterfeit policy and procedures including detection and prevention measures for counterfeit components
Vendor plan to protect the development pipeline and ensure authenticity of software and patches
Anti-counterfeit training materials and records for personnel responsible for detecting counterfeit components
Configuration control procedures and records for system components awaiting service, repair, or return to service
Component disposal procedures and documentation including techniques and methods for secure disposal of data, documentation, tools, and system components
